articles.author: Science Desk
articles.title: Send your name to Jupiter’s moon Europa before time runs out: Here’s how - The Indian Express
articles.description: Here is how you can send your name on a NASA mission that will explore Jupiter's icy moon Europe and look for signs of life.
articles.content: Not everyone is lucky enough to send their names on a microchip that will ride aboard NASAs Europa Clipper mission as it explores Jupiters moon and you can be one of them. The space agencys Message i… [+1773 chars]
